vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb5[15], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb6[1], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[9], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[8], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xyzw
dcl_input v3.xyzw
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyzw
dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyzw
dcl_temps 7
// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r6.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v3.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v3.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v3.xyzx
mad r0.xyz, cb1[1].xyzx, l(0.010000, 0.010000, 0.010000, 0.000000), r0.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul r0.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
mov r1.xyz, v0.xyzx
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r2.x, cb4[0].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r2.y, cb4[1].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r2.z, cb4[2].xyzw, r1.xyzw
add r2.xyz, -r2.xyzx, cb5[14].xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r2.xyzx, r2.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul r2.xyz, r0.wwww, r2.xyzx
mul r3.xyz, r0.xyzx, r2.zxyz
mad r3.xyz, r0.zxyz, r2.xyzx, -r3.xyzx
dp3 r0.x, r2.xyzx, r0.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, r3.xyzx, r3.xyzx
rsq r0.y, r0.y
mul r0.yzw, r0.yyyy, r3.xxyz
mul r3.xyz, r0.yzwy, r2.zxyz
mad r2.xyz, r2.yzxy, r0.zwyz, -r3.xyzx
dp3 r2.w, r2.xyzx, r2.xyzx
rsq r2.w, r2.w
mul r2.xyz, r2.wwww, r2.xyzx
mul r3.xyz, r2.yyyy, cb4[1].xyzx
mad r2.xyw, r2.xxxx, cb4[0].xyxz, r3.xyxz
mad r2.xyz, r2.zzzz, cb4[2].xyzx, r2.xywx
dp3 r2.w, v3.xyzx, v3.xyzx
sqrt r2.w, r2.w
max r2.w, r2.w, l(1.000000)
min r2.w, r2.w, cb0[5].w
add r3.x, -r2.w, l(1.000000)
mad r0.x, |r0.x|, r3.x, r2.w
mul r2.xyz, r0.xxxx, r2.xyzx
mul r3.xyz, r0.yyyy, cb4[1].xyzx
mad r0.xyw, r0.wwww, cb4[0].xyxz, r3.xyxz
mad r0.xyz, r0.zzzz, cb4[2].xyzx, r0.xywx
mad r0.xyz, v2.zzzz, r0.xyzx, v0.xyzx
mad r0.xyz, v2.wwww, r2.xyzx, r0.xyzx
mad r0.xyz, cb0[2].xxxx, cb1[0].xyzx, r0.xyzx
mad r0.xyz, cb0[2].yyyy, cb1[1].xyzx, r0.xyzx
mad r0.xyz, cb0[2].zzzz, cb1[2].xyzx, r0.xyzx
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r2.w, cb1[7].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r3.x, cb1[4].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r3.y, cb1[5].xyzw, r0.xyzw
div r3.zw, r3.xxxy, r2.wwww
dp4 r4.x, cb1[7].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r5.x, cb1[4].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r5.y, cb1[5].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r1.x, cb1[2].xyzw, r1.xyzw
add r1.xy, -r1.xxxx, -cb0[0].xzxx
div_sat r1.xy, r1.xyxx, cb0[0].ywyy
div r1.zw, r5.xxxy, r4.xxxx
add r4.xy, -r3.xyxx, r5.xyxx
add r1.zw, -r1.zzzw, r3.zzzw
dp2 r1.z, r1.zwzz, r1.zwzz
sqrt r1.z, r1.z
min r1.w, r1.z, cb0[8].z
add r1.z, r1.z, l(0.000100)
div r1.z, r1.w, r1.z
add r1.z, -r1.z, l(1.000000)
mul r1.z, r1.z, cb0[8].w
mad r2.xy, r1.zzzz, r4.xyxx, r3.xyxx
dp4 r2.z, cb1[6].xyzw, r0.xyzw
add r1.y, -r1.y, l(1.000000)
mul r1.x, r1.y, r1.x
ge r1.y, l(0.000000), r1.x
mul_sat o1.w, r1.x, v1.w
movc r1.xyzw, r1.yyyy, l(-2.000000,-2.000000,-2.000000,1.000000), r2.xyzw
mov o0.xyzw, r1.xyzw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 608656b253681211-vs.txt
ne r6.w, r1.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r6.w
  add r6.w, r1.w, -r6.y
  mad r1.x, r6.w, r6.x, r1.x
endif

mov o3.xyzw, r1.xyzw
mov o1.xyz, v1.xyzx
dp4 r1.x, cb1[0].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.y, cb1[1].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.z, cb1[2].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp3 r0.x, r1.xyzx, r1.xyzx
sqrt r0.x, r0.x
add r0.x, r0.x, -cb6[0].x
add r0.y, -cb6[0].x, cb6[0].y
div_sat r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
mul o2.z, r0.x, cb6[0].z
mov o2.xy, v2.xyxx
mov o2.w, v3.w
ret
// Approximately 88 instruction slots used
